name: Galaxy Miner: Budi & Ulil Adventure
description:
Help Budi & Ulil to find Ulil's home planet. But it's not easy. To do that, you need the best ship in the galaxy. Upgrade your ship and hone your skill to explore the vast galaxy. Beware of space pirates, as they will stop you from your quest. 

Ulil has special abilities, one of them is the ability to sense spices. Go discover new planets and mine their precious spices and artifacts.  

This game is made for the G'Develop Gam Jam 2 (Pet and/or Companions)

Control : W.A.S.D & mouse

Liluo game link: https://liluo.io/tfwa_games/galaxyminer-budi-ulil

Credits : 

- Dungeon Mining Tiles:  https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles

- Planet images : https://kenney.nl/
